abstract: Citigroup Alternative Investments is shutting down its Tribeca Capital Management hedge fund as its new leader, Vikram S. Pandit, puts his stamp on the long-overlooked division.
snippet: Citigroup Alternative Investments is shutting down its Tribeca Capital Management hedge fund as its new leader, Vikram S. Pandit, puts his stamp on the long-overlooked division.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup said yesterday that it was shutting its Tribeca Global Investments hedge fund, in the first significant move since Vikram S. Pandit took over its alternative investment group.

headline.main: A Citigroup Investment Chief Is Shutting a Hedge Fund
headline.print_headline: A Citigroup Investment Chief Is Shutting a Hedge Fund
